import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import '../App.css' const loginForm = (props: {sendLogin: (data: {email: string, password: string})=>void}) =>{ interface inputData { email: string; password: string } let data: inputData const handleSubmit = (event:any) =>{ event.preventDefault() data = { email: event.target.elements.email.value, password: event.target.elements.password.value } props.sendLogin(data) } return(

Log in

Email Password
) } export default loginForm
